ygData.subject: RE: EQ and Laptops
ygData.msgSnippet: I think what he means is if has a paladin named bob and a hot key for lay hands. The hot key for lay hands will be a blank space for bob the warrior on another
ygData.messageBody:
I think what he means is if has a paladin named bob and a hot key for lay
hands. The hot key for lay hands will be a blank space for bob the warrior
on another server (becuase he doesnt have the skill of course). There for to
get the EXACT layout he makes another bob the paladin. But you are right
anything else thats the same on both classes will transfer fine.

Adol
